channel.title: NPCs Dont Attack
channel.description:
Alright, here is my problem:
The server I co-admin/co-own is run using HuyaScape v1. When you hit a certain level, no NPCs besides the level 300+ attack you. Im not sure on the exact location, but people at Tahzar [SP?] and the gods and such don't; only ones I see that do are Jad and KQueen... Any idea on why this is? My character is at level 103, and even level 149s wont hit back... Its not too bad, I don't have to worry about dying, but it'd be nice for the NPCs to atleast put up a challenge.

item.title: NPCs Dont Attack
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

Solution: Don’t use a framework made by a moparscaper.

Read full topic
